Which could lead us to these two new colors. This lavender and mint. I think these colors are super realistic because the last Apple Watch bands they released during their spring lineup were basically featuring these two colors. So let's just take a little visualization of what would the mint and the lavender look like against all of these guys, so let's see. It looks like they were gonna be removing two of the colors. And it doesn't really make sense, especially in this scheme of these, although maybe the coral didn't sell as well so that's how they decided that one has to go.
